dataset_id: OMPS/NPP L1B NP Radiance EV Calibrated Geolocated Swath Orbital V2 (OMPS_NPP_NPEV_L1B) at GES DISC
title: OMPS/NPP L1B NP Radiance EV Calibrated Geolocated Swath Orbital V2 (OMPS_NPP_NPEV_L1B) at GES DISC
summary:
The OMPS-NPP L1B NP Radiance EV Calibrated Geolocated Swath Orbital collection contains calibrated and geolocated radiances from 300 to 380 nm measured by the OMPS Nadir-Profiler sensor on the Suomi-NPP satellite.

Each granule typically contains data from the daylight portion of a single orbit (about 50 minutes). Spatial coverage is nearly global (-82 to 82 degrees latitude), and there are about 14.5 orbits per day each with a single nadir measurement along the satellite track.
